meanings.sent1: Tommy felt like a muggins when he realized he had been tricked.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a muggins and fall for that obvious scam.
meanings.sent3: The muggins in the story always believed everything people told him.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a muggins standing there with her pockets turned inside out.
meanings.sent5: Being a muggins in this town will only lead to trouble.

meanings.definition: A game in which a player is chosen to perform a task or take a risk.
meanings.sent1: In the game of muggins, the unlucky player had to jump into the cold lake.
meanings.sent2: Let's play muggins and see who has to clean up the mess.
meanings.sent3: The family decided to play muggins to determine who would do the dishes.
meanings.sent4: Being chosen for the task felt like being the muggins in a twisted game.
meanings.sent5: The muggins of the group had to face the challenge head-on.
